member.name: M:VNEI.UI.SelectUI.CreateSelection(UnityEngine.Transform,System.Action{System.String},UnityEngine.Vector2,VNEI.Logic.ItemType[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a Popup window to select an item. Only works after VNEI has indexed all items.
member.param: Callback of selection, returns a string with the internal name of the prefab. If no items are indexed or section is aborted, it returns an empty string.
Default ItemTypes. If null all are shown

member.name: T:VNEI.Log
member.summary: Helper class for properly logging from static contexts.
